channel.title: REITs on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in REITs on FinanClub

item.title: O
item.description: score:-12 Chances: Income stocks should have a two-pronged tailwind coming in 2024. The Fed’s accommodative approach and favorable market fundamentals make REITs like EQIX, O, EGP, and STAG well-poised to excel in 2024. Realty Income Corp has recently announced a dividend of $0.

item.title: AGNC
item.description: score:81 Chances: Compared to this past year, 2024 is expected to be much better for the economy, and that means it will look even better for the stock market. With interest rates likely to come down in the new year, REITs may become even more attractive.
